I have some issues with the card linkages. I can only withdraw from current account only.
Edwin explain to me very well. He also help me all the way to explain to the high counter staff.
I am very pleased with his patience and going extra miles to help me achieve what I wanted.
Excellent services received. Thank you very much

Edwin is very knowledgeable and skilful in understanding my needs in helping me pay my SingTel bill.
I have the payments problem for a few days and could not resolved it
He is skillful in trouble shooting and resolve my payment problem within a few minutes.
Appreciate his patience and explanation and very good service. Thank you.

Just visited UOB Bendemeer branch, the services provided by the three pretty ladies never failed to impress me. I see team work n commitment from their good n efficiency service. Keep up the good work!
